info.author: Michalis Giannakidis
info.description:
cvsxxdiff is a collection of utilities which allow the user to graphically
review changes, track status and manage commits of files managed by a CVS
repository. 

Convenient options to review changes of a file as it was n versions
ago along with the respective logs are provided. When invoked in conflict
resolve mode, it works as a graphical tool to resolve conflicts. At commit
time, logs are formated based on a user defined template. 

Graphical output of diffs is provided by xxdiff.
info.keywords: CVS, utilities, programming, review, patches, revisions, graphical, diff, differences
info.name: cvsxxdiff
info.summary: Developer utilities for CVS managed projects
